title: RACE AND NATIONAL IDENTITY A Conversation With Glenn Loury
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What role should race play in how we think of ourselves as Americans?  I discuss the race debate with Professor Glenn Loury.  We cover the role of culture, the wealth gap, high levels of inner city-violence, the case for reparations, and police killings.
itunes:subtitle: What role should race play in how we think of ourâ€¦
description: What role should race play in how we think of ourselves as Americans?  I discuss the race debate with Professor Glenn Loury.  We cover the role of culture, the wealth gap, high levels of inner city-violence, the case for reparations, and police killings.
